price: Au wamepata miungu katika ardhi inayo fufua?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ
footnotes: Washirikina hawafanyi wafanyavyo walio karibishwa katika kumsafishia ibada Mwenyezi Mungu, bali wao wamewaabudu wenginewe, na wakafanya miungu duniani isiyo stahiki kuabudiwa. Na huwaje kwenda kuabudu kitu kisicho kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu, ambacho hakiwezi kufufua?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
